relation: Grendel the Really Old Magician Instructor
Way to the Forest : Shining Forest Path
Repairs durability on equipment. Also involved in several quests.
Teleports you to the Jump Quest area during and after completing Sabitrama's quests.
Also known as Dr. Betty. Starts quests.
Sells 100% scrolls. See here for the prices and types.
Turns Beginners into Magicians and gives quests.
Stands next to Serabi the Fairy. Sells magician weapons.
Stands next to Flora the Fairy. Sells magician armor.
Also known as Tia in MSEA
